mean_cn: adj. 罪恶昭彰的，残暴的，丑恶可耻的，明目张胆的
mean_en: very bad :too bad to be ignored
word_etyma: flagr火焰+ant形容词后缀→燃烧的→罪恶像火一样烧→flagrant罪恶昭彰的
short_phrase: flagrant theft of the old woman's purse
sentence: This flagrant theft happened on a busy street, in broad daylight.
sentence_trans: 光天化日之下，那桩罪恶昭彰的盗窃案发生在了一条繁忙的大街上。
